Name: Landmarks, Ditmas Park West Historic District, DL 547/LP 2693, Brooklyn (N 260210 HKK).
Title: Application No. N 260210 HKK (DL 547, LP 2693) (Ditmas Park West Historic District) submitted by the Landmarks Preservation Commission, pursuant to Section 3020 of the New York City Charter, for the historic district designation of the Ditmas Park West Historic District, consisting of properties generally bounded by Stratford Road to the west, Dorchester Road to the north, East 16 Street to the east, and Ditmas Avenue to the south, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 14, Council District 40.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings, Resiliency and Dispositions
